text:
Ildikó Pécsi (21 May 1940 – 5 December 2020) was a Hungarian actress and politician. She appeared in more than one hundred movies from 1961 until 2008. She was a member of the National Assembly between 1994 to 1998. Pécsi was known for her roles in "Tales of a Long Journey", "A Strange Role" and in "Just like Home".
Pécsi died on 5 December 2020 in Budapest at the age of 80.
